title: Genesis 9:8-17
description: Scripture reference used in FCT Module 3

content.contextInModule: Genesis 9:8-17 (Noah’s Covenant): Signifies God's promise not to destroy humanity again, setting a precedent for the relationship between divine mercy and human behavior.
